headline: How the stock market made back all its losses after Trump escalated the trade war
summary: The article highlights that after Trump accelerated U.S. tariffs on nearly all trading partners, investors saw a sharp decline in the stock market within four days when he announced "90-day PAUSE." Investors weren't clear if the tariffs would result in reductions or increases in important sectors.
